```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(here)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)

load(file = here("static", "shawBarriers.rda"))

leaflet(width = '100%', height = '500pt') %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron) %>% 
  addMarkers(data = shawBarriers, 
             clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(),
             popup = paste("Barrier: ", shawBarriers$BarrierID, "<br>",
                           "Description: ", shawBarriers$Descrip, "<br>"))
```
